stadium.name: The Old Fort
stadium.description: The team plays within the crumbling, stone-ringed ruins of an ancient hill-fort. The 'runes' are just old, weathered carvings on the standing stones that serve as obstacles.

stats.pregame_ritual: Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Collecting a pebble from every field they've ever played on.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.
Spitting into their own hand and then slapping their face with it.
Reciting the names of legendary Trollball players of the past.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
A toast of goat's milk to the health of their rivals.
Sharing a ceremonial, non-alcoholic grog from a communal cup.
Tracing an invisible, complex sigil over their heart.
Patting every beast of burden they see on the way to the match.
Leading the team in a synchronized chant that slowly gets louder.

Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.

stadium.name: The Guilder's Field
stadium.description: An opulent stadium sponsored by the powerful Merchant's Guild. The stands feature luxurious, velvet-lined boxes for bankers, who are often more focused on making deals than the game.

stats.pregame_ritual: Washing their hands with dirt.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Meticulously cleaning each stud on their boots with a special brush.
Eating a raw onion, layer by layer, without crying.
Getting a teammate to pour a bucket of cold water over their head.
A team-wide moment of absolute silence to 'gather their thoughts'.
Sharpening the edges of their blunted weapon (an exercise in futility).
Humming a tune they believe only they know.
Lighting a small piece of parchment on fire and inhaling the smoke.
Avoiding eye contact with anyone wearing the color green.
Eating a dandelion, stem and all.
A team-wide moment of absolute silence to 'gather their thoughts'.

preGame:
# üèÜ PLAYOFFS: THE DECIDING CLASH AT THE OLD FORT! üèÜ

Hello everybody, this is Nok the Corrupter coming to you LIVE from the mist-choked ramparts of **The Old Fort** in Kerlauger! Golly gee, folks, what a day for a series finale! We are at Game 3 of this Best-of-Three thriller, and the atmosphere is so thick with tension you could carve it like a prime rib at a Merchant Guild gala! The **New Prosperity Profits** and the **Kerlauger Runeguard** are tied 1-1, and tonight, one of these teams is moving on while the other is taking a one-way trip to the loser's bracket! The stakes are higher than Lord Orzalon's tower, and the fans are absolutely buzzing!

I see the Profits' fans in their velvet-lined boxes‚Äîbless their gold-lined hearts‚Äîwatching **Pulchi Benyamin** munching on her pre-game dandelion! She‚Äôs eating the stem and all, folks! Talk about a high-fiber approach to a high-stakes game! Meanwhile, **Yoshi Cathy** is finishing off a raw onion over in the dugout. He‚Äôs not crying because of the pressure, folks, he‚Äôs crying because of the sulfur! That‚Äôs the kind of gritty determination that makes a demon‚Äôs heart sing! On the home side, the Runeguard are looking fierce. **Harilda Sigsmond** is leading the squad in a synchronized chant that‚Äôs shaking the very foundation of these ancient stones! 

We‚Äôre playing in **The Old Fort**, and the conditions are absolutely magnificent for a massacre! The **Dense Fog** is rolling in, and the **Uneven Footing** of these ruins is going to turn ankles into toothpicks! I suspect the so-called 'heroes' of the White Ravens, like Colm, are used to this dirt, but will the money-priests of New Prosperity be able to handle the grime? I sure hope not! I‚Äôm pulling for the Profits purely because I love seeing those fancy spears get bloodied, but my heart is always with the Ebon Gate Corruptors! Let's get to the carnage, because in Trollball, if you aren't bleeding, you aren't trying! 

Buckle up, Osterra, because this is the playoff drama we live for! Can the wealth of the Guilder's Field overcome the ancient runes of Kerlauger? We're about to find out! And remember, keep your eyes on the ball and your hands on your weapons! It‚Äôs time for TROLLBALL! üõ°Ô∏èüíÄüî•
postGame:
# üèÅ POST-GAME WRAP-UP: THE RUNEGUARD PROTECT THE FORT! üèÅ

Holy smokes, folks! What a humdinger of a series finale! I am absolutely breathless, and not just because the fog is full of sulfur today! In a game that saw more blood spilled than a butcher‚Äôs shop on a Tuesday, the **Kerlauger Runeguard** have defended their home ruins and taken the series with a final score of **6 to 5**! The New Prosperity Profits gave it their all, but in the end, the ancient stones of Kerlauger proved too much for the merchant‚Äôs gold! The Profits are headed to the loser's bracket, and Chairman Brennen Farno is going to need more than a prayer to the Green Goddess to fix his mood tonight!

The game kicked off with a frantic scramble in Center Field, where **Boleslaw Heathcote** snatched up the troll head like a banker grabbing a foreclosure notice! The Profits were moving fast, but the Runeguard defense was biting back early. **Reginauld Cordell** tried to put the stops on **Yoshi Cathy**, but missed! It was a high-speed chase through the ruins, with **Aufmann Tedric** advancing the ball while **Krueger Jacinthe** threw a pass so wild it nearly hit a gargoyle! 

But then, the Profits drew first blood on the scoreboard! **Milman Galvan** took a daring shot from the Home Field and absolutely nailed it! A **2-point SHOOT** that silenced the local crowd! The Profits were up early, but the violence was just beginning. **Vivia Namara** decided to introduce **Pulchi Benyamin** to the dirt with a tackle so hard I heard the bones rattle from the broadcast booth! Pulchi was **INJURED**, and the Profits' momentum took a massive hit alongside her!

The injury report started growing faster than interest on a loan! **Reginauld Cordell** leveled **Boleslaw Heathcote**, and **Lashondra Niehaus** took out **Abramson Doxia**! It was a literal meat-grinder out there, folks! **Benjie Foulk** even sent **Krueger Jacinthe** to the healer's tent! At one point, the officials had to pause because one of the teams literally didn't have enough players standing to continue! Now THAT is what I call a playoff atmosphere! I haven't seen this much carnage since the last time Sir Tanos tried to lead a charge!

The Profits weren't dead yet, though. **Abramson Doxia** returned from the healer and immediately fired a shot from Center Field for another **2-point SCORES**! But the Runeguard answered back instantly! **Lon Gabriell** found an opening in the Center Field and let it fly‚Äî**2 points** for Kerlauger! It was a back-and-forth slugfest that had the fans in the velvet boxes clutching their pearls! 

As we approached the first halftime, the hits just kept coming. **Harilda Sigsmond** absolutely flattened **Milman Galvan**, and **Lashondra Niehaus** sent **Gladdie Farika** to the sidelines! The medical staff in Kerlauger are going to be working overtime tonight, and I hope they‚Äôre charging by the soul! We went into the break with the Runeguard trailing, but the second half changed everything!

After the break, the Profits tried to extend their lead with some fancy footwork from **Faina Hendrix** and **Krueger Jacinthe**. But **Lashondra Niehaus** was a woman possessed, tackling **Aufmann Tedric** into the next reality! The Profits were struggling to keep possession, and then the Runeguard struck gold! **Gurney Fadiman** took a shot from the Home Field‚Äî**2 points**! Then, not to be outdone, **Vivia Namara** launched one from Center Field for another **2 points**! The scoreboard was flipping faster than a coin at a casino!

But wait, there was more! **Milman Galvan** of the Profits pulled off the play of the week! She passed the ball to... HERSELF! She sprinted into the End Zone and dunked that troll head like she was putting a gold bar in a vault! A **1-point Touchdown** that brought the Profits within striking distance! The tension was so thick you could have sold it as a luxury commodity!

The final minutes were a symphony of violence. **Krueger Jacinthe** took out **Johnna Beetner**, but the Runeguard wouldn't fold. **Lorilee Aldred** and **Lashondra Niehaus** went on a tackling spree, taking out **Aufmann Tedric**, **Boleslaw Heathcote**, and **Yoshi Cathy** in rapid succession! It was a total defensive collapse for the Profits as their stars were carried off the field one by one. 

The Profits tried one last desperate push, but **Pellikka Concettina**‚Äôs tackle on **Lashondra Niehaus** was too little, too late. **Harilda Sigsmond** finished the job by flattening **Faina Hendrix**, sealing the victory for the home team! Final score: **Kerlauger Runeguard 6, New Prosperity Profits 5**! The Runeguard take the series 2-1 and move forward in the winners' bracket!

What a game, what a series! The Profits had the popularity and the fancy gear, but the Runeguard had the grit of the Old Fort in their veins! I bet those 'heroes' of the White Ravens are celebrating with non-alcoholic grog tonight, while I‚Äôll be celebrating with something much stronger! The Profits are headed to the loser's bracket to rethink their investment strategy. Maybe next time they should spend less time cleaning their boots and more time practicing their blocks!

This is Nok the Corrupter, signing off from a very bloody, very foggy Kerlauger! Congratulations to the Runeguard, and better luck next time to the Profits! Stay tuned for more playoff action, and remember: in the Everwar, death is temporary, but the shame of a 2-point miss is forever! Hail to the Corruptors! Goodnight, Osterra! üèÅüèÜüí∞
